name: Canal Runner
description:
After the plight of the Ever Given I had the desire to build a short, quick game based on the idea of piloting a ship through a Canal. While my day job did an admirable job of getting in the way of my time for this project, I got it to a playable gameplay concept - you can indeed pilot a single boat through a very short canal. Tap the WASD keys to increase/decrease your throttle/rudder, it feels funky, like piloting a boat. There's lots of fun gameplay to expand on later - currents, winds, time pressure, water pressure, other ships, space aliens trying to abduct and probe your cargo containers...

Built with Godot 3.3.
